Text:
Not sure if it's just me but there are some issues with artifacting during playback.  Other 1080p movies play fine, though I don't have any others that are IMAX versions.  

Would be glad to hear back from others whether it's the release or just me that has these issues.
Retract my previous comment about the artifacting.  For some reason, MPC actually blurs at times while MP12 doesn't.  Odd.

I can't help but wonder if this was closer to 12 GB if i could even tell the difference.  :D ....  @lazyazz .. if you look under the options for MPC I have got a lot better performance (slow pc causing trouble?) if i set it (under options > playback > output) to "use texture surfaces and render in 3D" ...  my old computer had trouble keeping up w/ 1080p movies due to my CPU.. when you set it this way it allows your GPU to do more of the work... or something lol
